CustomField.description: Used for California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). This field should be included in all future Page layouts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Field controlled by Marketo. Field is updated when a Contact requests they do not want their personal data sold. When this field is updated, DO NOT SELL this Contact's data.
CustomField.label: Do Not Sell Reason
